subject: Climate & Environment
title: Water Recycling
description: A fast breakdown of Water Recycling for builders.

hook.text: Singapore drinks recycled wastewater. It is called NEWater and it is cleaner than tap water.

buildup.text: Advanced treatment purifies sewage through microfiltration, reverse osmosis, and UV light.

discovery.text: The result exceeds drinking water standards. Most people cannot taste any difference.

twist.text: The biggest barrier to water recycling is not technology â€” it is public perception.

climax.text: Cities like Windhoek, Namibia have safely recycled water for drinking since the 1960s.

punchline.text: All water is recycled. The question is how well we clean it.
